content.rendered:
The New York State Public High School Athletic Association Inc. (NYSPHSAA) announced its winter scholar-athlete teams. To qualify as a scholar-athlete team, a team’s grade point average (GPA) for 75 percent of the roster must be greater than or equal to at least 90 percent.  

The following winter varsity teams were named scholar-athlete teams.

  • Girls Basketball
  • Girls Bowling
  • Girls Indoor Track/Field
  • Girls Skiing (both Alpine and Nordic teams)
  • Gymnastics
  • Boys Basketball
  • Boys Bowling
  • Boys Indoor Track/Field
  • Boys Skiing (both Alpine and Nordic teams)
  • Boys Swimming/Diving
  • Boys Wrestling
Congratulations to our scholar-athletes!
